name: Dancing in the moonlight
description:
Description

"Dancing Under the Moon" is a single-player only 3d bullet-running action game.
Enjoy the sensation of being overwhelmed by a barrage of bullets in 3d space.

Game Genre

3d danmaku action game

Features

  • A "pure" "danmaku" "action game" that moves up, down, left, right, back and forth to avoid.
  • Power from TPS perspective
  • Easy and simple to operate
  • Sophisticated and beautiful 3d barrage
  • A total of 30 different level-designed barrages
  • (personal development)
